oval:metadata.oval:description: Install the Policy Auditor (PA) Module.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure Periodic Execution of AIDE
oval:metadata.oval:description: By default, AIDE does not install itself for periodic execution. Periodically running AIDE is necessary to reveal unexpected changes in installed files.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Configure Notification of Post-AIDE Scan Details
oval:metadata.oval:description: AIDE should notify appropriate personnel of the details of a scan after the scan has been run.

oval:criterion.comment: notify personnel when aide completes in cron.(d|daily|weekly|monthly)

oval:metadata.oval:title: Verify File Hashes with RPM
oval:metadata.oval:description: Verify the RPM digests of system binaries using the RPM database.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Verify File Permissions Using RPM
oval:metadata.oval:description: Verify the permissions of installed packages by comparing the installed files with information about the files taken from the package metadata stored in the RPM database.

oval:criterion.comment: mode of all files matches local rpm database

oval:metadata.oval:title: Ensure !authenticate Is Not Used in Sudo
oval:metadata.oval:description: Checks sudo usage without authentication

oval:metadata.oval:title: Ensure gpgcheck Enabled for Local Packages
oval:metadata.oval:description: The localpkg_gpgcheck option should be used to ensure that checking of an RPM package's signature always occurs prior to its installation.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Verify /etc/group Mode Permissions
oval:metadata.oval:description: This test makes sure that /etc/group has mode 0644. If the target file or directory has an extended ACL, then it will fail the mode check.

oval:metadata.oval:description: This test makes sure that /etc/passwd has mode 0644. If the target file or directory has an extended ACL, then it will fail the mode check.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Verify /etc/shadow Mode Permissions
oval:metadata.oval:description: This test makes sure that /etc/shadow has mode 0000. If the target file or directory has an extended ACL, then it will fail the mode check.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Verify /etc/ssh/ Mode Permissions
oval:metadata.oval:description: This test makes sure that /etc/ssh/ has mode 0640. If the target file or directory has an extended ACL, then it will fail the mode check.

oval:metadata.oval:title: Ensure /home Located On Separate Partition
oval:metadata.oval:description: If stored locally, create a separate partition for /home. If /home will be mounted from another system such as an NFS server, then creating a separate partition is not necessary at this time, and the mountpoint can instead be configured later.
